<!-- BEGIN_AUTOGENERATED -->

# Kwrestarg Node Formatting

Represents a keyword rest argument (i.e. `foo` in `def m(**foo); end`)

<!-- END_AUTOGENERATED -->

## Formats

Before:

```ruby
def m(**foo); end
```

After:

```ruby
def m(**foo); end
```

## Formats as the last argument

Before:

```ruby
foo(one, two, three, **bar)
```

After:

```ruby
foo(one, two, three, **bar)
```

## Formats next to a splat

Before:

```ruby
foo(*args, **bar)
```

After:

```ruby
foo(*args, **bar)
```
